A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm in awe that many fans didn't like this movie. Not only did it succeed in not regurgitating the same plot over again the way Episode VII did\, but it also made nods to the original books and displayed force powers fitting of a bloodline born of the Force. They didn't rehash the story but instead took the blueprint and evolved it.  Watch the movie if you're a fan\, because you'll love it. If you're a young millennial who has only seen the prequels\, and later watched the original and didn't like it\,  this probably isn't the movie for you.
